full_summary:
RFI Translation Services
===========================================================

### Tender Details

| Field | Value | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Reference Number | PW-__ZF-526-41490 | string | Unique identifier for the tender |
| Amendment Number | 4 | integer | Number of amendments made to the tender |
| Solicitation Number | EN966-140305/M | string | Unique identifier for the solicitation |
| Publication Date | 2023-10-09 | date | Date the tender was published |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-11-08T14:00:00 | datetime | Deadline for submissions |
| Amendment Date | 2023-11-08 | date | Date the most recent amendment was made |
| Expected Contract Start Date | N/A | date | Planned start date for the contract |
| Expected Contract End Date | N/A | date | Planned end date for the contract |
| Tender Status | Expired | string | Current status of the tender |
| GSN | R109D | string | Geographic Supply Number |
| UNSPSC | N/A | string | UNSPSC classification number |
| Procurement Category | SRV | string | Category of procurement |

### Description

The Government of Canada is issuing a Request for Information (RFI) for Translation Services under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Tender Description**
This RFI is seeking information from suppliers regarding their capabilities and experience in providing translation services.

**Delivery Location**
Deliveries are to be made to the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Language**
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information**
To obtain more information or submission details, please contact Isabelle Gratton at:

* Email: <isabelle.gratton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
* Phone: (873) 355-9751
* Address: Les Terrasses de la Chaudière, 10, rue Wellington, 5e étage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

**Attachments**
Four attachments are available for download:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/10/12/85735574b794897713a63a740a1db508/ABES.PROD.PW__ZF.B526.E41490.EBSU001.PDF
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/
